shortIntro.title: What This Game Needs to Run Smoothly
shortIntro.para1: Clash of Clans is a lightweight and highly-optimized strategy game that runs smoothly on almost all Android and iOS devices. Performance mainly depends on RAM, CPU efficiency, and stable internet.
shortIntro.para2: Low-end devices can run the game at around 30FPS, while mid-range and high-end devices deliver a stable 60FPS experience.

faqIntroText: Here are the most frequently asked questions about Clash of Clans performance, device support, and optimization.

faqList.question: Can Clash of Clans run on 1GB RAM devices?
faqList.answer: Yes, the game can run on 1GB RAM devices, but performance is smoother on 2GB or higher.

faqList.question: Does Clash of Clans support 60 FPS?
faqList.answer: Yes, most modern mid-range and high-end devices support stable 60 FPS gameplay.

faqList.question: How much internet speed is required for Clash of Clans?
faqList.answer: The game requires only 2–5 Mbps for stable gameplay since it uses very low data.
